title: My touchscreen on my Pixel 4 is way off, does not come close to where my fingers touch the screen.
content: My touchscreen is way off. It does not respond to where I am typing. This is my second pixel 4 with this issue. I want a phone that types where I type. Never getting a google phone again after this one gets replaced, it is ridiculous that they still haven't made a screen that responds to where I am typing.
